reference.title: apiImpl
reference.shortdesc: The <apiImpl> element describes the classifier implementation for specific forms, including class, data type, interface, component, and other API items.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <apiImpl> element can contain code fragments or other source code for generating the supporting code for the interface (especially for functions and methods). The processing expectation is that the <apiImpl> element is hidden from the audience the implementation should not be exposed to.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following example shows a simple <apiImpl> element for a VisualBasic property:
example.codeblock: <apiValue> <apiValueDetail> <apiValueDef> <apiDefNote> Returns the IRXEModel object to which the element belongs. </apiDefNote> </apiValueDef> </apiValueDetail> <apiImpl>Statement</apiImpl> </apiValue>
